metadata.description: This 1941 issue of Philippines Magazine features the speech delivered by President Manuel L. Quezon before the Philippine National Assembly surveying Philippine Defense Responsibilities, an article about Philippine Advertising by M. Farolan, an article entitled "One Language for All Filipinos" by Dr. Leopoldo Y. Yabes, among others.
metadata.subject: Magazine
metadata.title: Philippines Magazine Vol. 1 No. 3 (1941)
